Grouped_Utterances: I’ve considered it, but I’m a bit nervous about it. I guess I’m still curious about how to keep building my confidence.
I feel more hopeful, but I still have days where I struggle. I try to remind myself of the progress I’ve made, but it’s hard.
I guess fear of judgment. What if they don’t like it?
Yes, they’ve been great for clearing my mind. I’ve even started listening to music while I walk.
Hi, Ellie! I’ve been doing pretty well. I stuck to my writing and walking goals. It felt empowering. I even wrote a few more short stories!

That’s a good point. Maybe I could share it with a friend first. It’s understandable. Would it help to create a list of affirmations or reminders that you can refer to during those times? Let’s brainstorm a few together. How about starting with “I am capable of creating and sharing my stories”? Great! You could also include “I am allowed to feel my emotions and take things one step at a time.”  Would you like to write these down and add to them over time?

Maybe I could join a writing group or workshop. That sounds like an excellent idea! Engaging with others can provide support and encouragement. Would you like to research some options before our next session?
